Name: Alchemy
Description: Ability to understand the flora of the world, understand chemistry, concoct potions/remedies/poisons, cook, and treat minor afflictions

Name: Arcana
Description: Ability to attack with magic, as well as understand general magical science and uses thereof

Name: Athletics
Description: Ability to perform feats of athleticism, like climbing, moving quickly, and acting more often

Name: Burglary
Description: Ability to understand criminality, get into and out of places, steal items, hide your tracks, and talk your way out of bad/difficult situations

Name: Deceive
Description: Ability to lie, cheat, deceive, trick, and manipulate.

Name: Empathy
Description: Ability to read people, understand, diagnose, and heal.

Name: Engineering
Description: Ability to use whatever the technology of the setting is.

Name: Hunting
Description: Ability to track, trap, tame, and interact with animals

Name: Lore
Description: General knowledge of the local/global history, geography, religion, and politics.

Name: Physique
Description: The body's natural physical aptitude and toughness

Name: Rapport
Description: The ability to rile/persuade groups, as well as yourself.

Name: Shoot
Description: The ability to attack from a range.

Name: Stealth
Description: The ability to sneak, hide, and attack with surprise

Name: Survival
Description: General survival skills, including understanding the environment, the elements, a degree of knowledge of fauna and flora, ability to detect danger, and general healthy living

Name: Will
Description: The power of mind, resisting mental effects as well as improved mental acuity and endurance
